long_description: The Rossignol BC 70 Positrack skis offer control and maneuverability and work great when you spend most of your time off trail and only a small bit on trail. Wood cores with air channels create skier-friendly flex and keep the skis light and maneuverable. Full-length steel edges cut into the slope for excellent stability. AR Positrack waxless bases provide good grip in most snow conditions. The Rossignol BC 70 Positrack backcountry skis pair well with NNN BC bindings (sold separately).
short_description: The Rossignol BC 70 Positrack skis offer control and maneuverability and work great when you spend most of your time off trail and only a small bit on trail.
